app.title: CompressYourPhoto
app.tagline: Compress images instantly, privately, and for free

hero.headline: Compress Your Photos
hero.subheadline: Fast, private, and free image compression
hero.dropzone: Drop photos here or click to upload
hero.supportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC, GIF

privacy.title: 100% Private
privacy.description: All compression happens in your browser. Your photos never leave your device.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Compress images in seconds using modern browser technology.

multilingual.title: Multilingual
multilingual.description: Available in 8 languages to serve users worldwide.

noDataCollection.title: No Data Collection
noDataCollection.content: We do not collect, store, or transmit any of your personal data or images. Your photos are processed entirely within your browser and never leave your device.

clientSide.title: 100% Client-Side Processing
clientSide.content: All image compression happens locally in your browser using JavaScript. We use the browser-image-compression library which runs entirely on your device. No images are ever uploaded to any server.

noServers.title: No Server Processing
noServers.content: Unlike other image compression services, we don't have servers that process your images. This means your photos remain completely private and under your control at all times.

cookies.title: Cookies & Local Storage
cookies.content: We only use local storage to remember your language preference. We do not use tracking cookies, analytics, or any third-party services that collect your data.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Compress your images in 4 simple steps - all within your browser

step1.title: Upload Your Images
step1.content: Drag and drop your photos onto the upload area, or click to select files from your device. We support JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC, and GIF formats.

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.content: Choose your compression quality (10-100%), set a maximum width if needed, and select your desired output format. Higher quality means larger files, lower quality means smaller files.

step3.title: Compress
step3.content: Click the compress button and watch as your images are processed instantly in your browser. The compression uses advanced algorithms to reduce file size while maintaining visual quality.

step4.title: Download
step4.content: Download your compressed images individually or all at once as a ZIP file. Your original files remain untouched on your device.

whyPrivate.title: Why Is It Private?
whyPrivate.content: Your images never leave your device. All compression happens in your browser using JavaScript. We don't have servers that receive your photos - everything runs locally on your computer or phone.

languages.title: Available Languages
languages.subtitle: CompressYourPhoto is available in 8 languages to serve users worldwide
languages.helpTranslate: Want to help translate CompressYourPhoto into your language?

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using CompressYourPhoto, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

service.title: Description of Service
service.content: CompressYourPhoto provides a free, browser-based image compression service. All image processing occurs locally in your browser - no files are uploaded to any server. The service is provided 'as is' without any warranties.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: You retain all rights to your images. We do not claim any ownership or rights to the images you compress using our service. The CompressYourPhoto name, logo, and website design are owned by Stellarizon Digitals Ltd.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: CompressYourPhoto and Stellarizon Digitals Ltd shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from your use of the service, including but not limited to loss of data or image quality.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

what.title: What Are Cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device by websites you visit. They help websites remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

usage.title: How We Use Cookies
usage.content: CompressYourPhoto uses minimal cookies and local storage. We prioritize your privacy and only store essential information to provide the service.

essential.title: Essential Storage
essential.content: We use browser local storage to save your language preference so the site displays in your chosen language on return visits.

preference.title: Preference Storage
preference.content: Your compression settings (quality level, output format) may be saved locally to restore your preferences on future visits.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We do not use any third-party tracking cookies, analytics services, or advertising networks. Your browsing activity on CompressYourPhoto is not tracked or shared with anyone.

control.title: Managing Cookies
control.content: You can clear your browser's local storage and cookies at any time through your browser settings. This will reset your language preference but will not affect the core functionality of the service.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us at:

general.title: General Disclaimer
general.content: The information and services provided by CompressYourPhoto are for general use only. While we strive to provide a reliable image compression service, we make no representations or warranties about the accuracy, reliability, or suitability of the service for any particular purpose.

noWarranty.title: No Warranty
noWarranty.content: CompressYourPhoto is provided 'as is' without warranty of any kind, express or implied. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or that any defects will be corrected.

accuracy.title: Accuracy of Results
accuracy.content: Compression results may vary depending on image type, content, and selected settings. We cannot guarantee specific file size reductions or quality outcomes. Always keep original copies of important images.

external.title: External Links
external.content: Our website may contain links to external sites. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall CompressYourPhoto or Stellarizon Digitals Ltd be liable for any loss or damage arising from your use of the service, including loss of data, revenue, or profits.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about this Disclaimer, please contact us at:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions about CompressYourPhoto? Need support or have feedback?

email.title: Email Us
email.description: We'd love to hear from you. Send us an email and we'll respond as soon as possible.

support.title: Support
support.content: Having trouble with the image compressor? Let us know and we'll help you out.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.content: We appreciate your suggestions for improving CompressYourPhoto.
